entry.title: Network Performance Issues in India
entry.content:
Sep 17, 02:27 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 17, 01:39 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 17, 01:36 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is aware of high latencies occurring in India.

We are working to analyse and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Elevated number of 5xx errors in Sydney
entry.content:
Sep 13, 17:30 UTC
Resolved - Between 17:40-17:55 UTC customers reaching Sydney, Australia would have experienced an elevated number of 5xx errors.

entry.title: Cloudflare API & Dashboard availability issues

Sep 12, 11:29 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 12, 10:31 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 12, 10:22 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Sep 12, 09:56 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is aware of, and investigating intermittent availability issues that potentially impact multiple customers being unable to use Cloudflare API and/or log onto Cloudflare Dashboard. Further detail will be provided as more information becomes available.

entry.title: Upcoming Datacenter Upgrades
entry.content:
Sep 11, 17:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 2, 19:31 UTC
Scheduled - Throughout the month of September 2021, we will be performing maintenance on various datacenters. Each window will be between 1am-6am local time of the data center. There is a possibility of a slight increase in latency during these maintenance windows. The most up-to-date schedule can be located here: Planned maintenance for Cloudflare data centers.

entry.title: DNS Update Delays
entry.content:
Sep 10, 20:37 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare has resolved the issue and services have resumed normal operation.

Sep 10, 19:47 UTC
Monitoring - Cloudflare has implemented a fix for this issue and is currently monitoring the results.

We will update the status once the issue is resolved.

Sep 10, 19:47 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating delays of up to ten minutes for updates to DNS records for Secondary DNS zones.

DNS resolution is not impacted. More updates to follow shortly.

Sep 10, 19:37 UTC
Monitoring - Cloudflare has implemented a fix for this issue and is currently monitoring the results.

We will update the status once the issue is resolved.

Sep 10, 19:27 UTC
Identified - Cloudflare has identified the issue and is implementing a fix.

We will update the status once we implement the fix.

Sep 10, 19:26 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating delays of up to 16 minutes for updates to DNS records. This delay also affects provisioning SSL certificates and new Argo Tunnel instances.

DNS resolution, existing SSL certificates, and established Argo Tunnels are not impacted. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Issues with viewing analytics and logs in Cloudflare for Teams Dashboard.
entry.content:
Sep 8, 00:33 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 8, 00:17 UTC
Update - Cloudflare is investigating issues viewing Gateway analytics and logging within the Cloudflare for Teams dashboard. Some users are reporting errors when attempting to view logs. This does not impact Gateway HTTP or DNS policy enforcement. Gateway logs are still being captured, but are not visible in the dashboard.

Sep 7, 23:38 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues viewing Gateway analytics and logging within the Cloudflare for Teams dashboard. Some users are reporting errors when attempting to view logs. This does not impact Gateway HTTP or DNS policy enforcement.

entry.title: Performance issue with public resolver 1.1.1.1 in San Jose, CA and Newark, NJ
entry.content:
Sep 8, 00:23 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 8, 00:20 UTC
Identified - We are rolling out a fix for resolving a performance issue with our Public Resolver 1.1.1.1 server that were observed in San Jose, CA and Newark, NJ.

entry.title: Dashboard Maintenance
entry.content:
Sep 7, 23:28 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Sep 7, 23:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 23, 22:29 UTC
Scheduled - The Cloudflare Dashboard will be unavailable during this maintenance window in order to improve future resiliency of the system. All dashboard UI actions will be unavailable during the window. Cloudflare's API and edge will be unaffected during this maintenance.

Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 7, 18:39 UTC
Investigating - Workers customers make experience issue using tailing logs through the Cloudflare dashboard and Wrangler.

entry.title: Cloudflare Dashboard and Cloudflare API service issues in EMEA region
entry.content:
Sep 7, 03:20 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 7, 03:12 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 7, 02:48 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 7, 02:40 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare Dashboard and related APIs in EMEA region.

These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge.

Customers using the Dashboard / Cloudflare APIs are impacted as requests might fail and/or errors may be displayed.

entry.title: Network Performance Issues in San Jose, United States
entry.content:
Sep 7, 00:30 UTC
Resolved - There was a brief network performance issue SJC colo/San Jose, United States

The impact of the event is from 9/07/2021 00:35 - 00:45 UTC.

The impact has been mitigated.

entry.title: Cloudflare DNS Analytics API and DNS Analytics Dashboard

Sep 6, 18:16 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 6, 17:33 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 6, 17:15 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with DNS Analytics API and DNS Analytics Dashboard. These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge. Customers using DNS Analytics are impacted as requests might fail and/or errors may be displayed.

entry.title: Network Analytics Delays
entry.content:
Sep 6, 13:27 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare has resolved the issue and services have resumed normal operation.

Sep 6, 12:38 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 6, 12:06 UTC
Identified - Cloudflare has identified the issue and is implementing a fix.

We will update the status once we implement the fix.

Sep 6, 11:34 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare Network Analytics is not displaying recent data.

This issue does not impact other analytics such as those for DNS and Rate Limiting.

Cloudflare is investigating the cause and will post further updates here.

entry.title: Image Resizing Availability Issues
entry.content:
Sep 4, 22:04 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 4, 17:55 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 4, 17:46 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Image Resizing the AVIF image format in some later versions of the Chrome browser, including but not limited to Version 93.0.4577.63. We are working to understand the full impact and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.
